ValidationRule.description: Return to Marketing with a "Pass to Sonian Service Provider" reason requires Reseller, Reseller Contact and Product Family to be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY ), ISPICKVAL(Disposition__c, 'Return to Marketing'), ISPICKVAL(Return_to_Marketing_Reasons__c, 'Pass to Sonian Service Provider'), OR( ISBLANK(Reseller__c), ISBLANK(Reseller_Contact__c), ISPICKVAL(Primary_Product_Family_2__c, '') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To Return to Marketing with a 'Pass to Sonian Service Provider' reason, you must select a Reseller, a Reseller Contact, and a Product Family.
